name: SMALL GROUP TOUR
description: Take the path less traveled with Collettes Small Group Explorations tours. Delve into immersive experiences. Settle into culturally accommodations. Savor authentic, local cuisine. Absorb a destinations true culture with more built-in free time.

name: Private Adventures
description: If you are an independent traveller and prefer not to be with a group and would like to avoid the trouble of not only researching and planning your trip but also making the necessary reservations, why not let Goway be of assistance.

name: VALUE VACATION
description: Are you on the hunt for cheap vacations? Perhaps you're looking for a luxury honeymoon at an all-inclusive resort. Maybe you are scouting for a last-minute family vacation package with a hotel thats suitable for children of any age.
